benchmark_details.name: MaterialBENCH
benchmark_details.overview: MaterialBENCH is a college-level benchmark dataset for large language models (LLMs) in the field of materials science, consisting of problem-answer pairs derived from university textbooks, including free-response and multiple-choice questions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the capabilities and limitations of existing large language models (LLMs) in solving materials science problems.

data.source: Problems selected from university-level textbooks on materials science.
data.annotation: Problems manually collected and verified by experts.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated based on the number of correct answers from the models.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in solving the problems.
methodology.validation: Manually verifying the correctness of the model responses by experts.
